name: Gather
description:
Harvest & Chill
Explore the islands, harvesting & delivering a variety of crops, while relaxing in the stress-free environments of the islands. Control small vehicles, interact with the tiny world and keep those pesky animals away from your harvest!

Pick Fruit
Collect a variety of fruits, vegetables and harvests to fulfil your quotas and deliver food from each island.

Deal with Animals
Rabbits and birds may try to block your harvesting skills so make sure you distract them before they cause you problems!

Gather stuff in tiny worlds
Discover hidden objects in the islands in unique locations to reveal more about the cartoon-inspired worlds. Each island is hand-crafted, designed to make exploring the game’s worlds as fun as possible.

Over 70 Levels
Spread across 5 worlds, and a variety of seasons, progress through the islands unlocking new challenges as you go!

----

Gather was developed as part of ‘Game Develop Month’ a community game jam challenging game developers to build a complete game in one month.
